ocean.question: I am big and blue and have lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am home to many fish.
🚢 Boats like to sail on me.
🏖️ You can play on the beach next to me.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and have shiny scales. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I go glub, glub.
🐡 I like to eat seaweed and small plants
🐟 I have fins to help me swim.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk slowly on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I hide my head inside my shell.
☀️ I like to lay in the sand.
🥬 I eat plants and sometimes small fish.

ocean.question: I’m a sea animal with eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I live in the sea.
🐾 I can squeeze into small places.
🎨 I can sometimes change color.

ocean.question: I am pink and live in a shell. People like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I live in the ocean.
🍴 I am often served in fancy restaurants.
🎨 Some people collect my shells.

ocean.question: I have a big tail and jump out of the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a mammal that lives in the ocean.
🗣️ I use clicks and whistles to talk to my friends.
🌊 I sometimes swim near boats.

ocean.question: I have many arms and look like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I live on the bottom of the ocean.
🖐️ I have 5 or more arms (sometimes a lot more).
🦞 I eat small creatures I find on the sea floor.

ocean.question: I’m a big fish with sharp teeth. Be careful of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a very large predator in the ocean.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🏊 I can swim very fast.

ocean.question: I float in the sea and can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of mostly water.
🚫 Be careful not to touch me!
👻 I am clear and wobbly.

ocean.question: I am small grains of sand that you find on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can build a sandcastle with me.
👣 I am fun to walk on with bare feet.
⏳ I am often found near the ocean.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am very hot!
😎 I give you light to see!
🔥 You can't touch me!

cosmos.question: I am round and white, and I come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm a circle, sometimes a slice!
🐺 Animals howl at me
💫 I go around the Earth!

cosmos.question: I twinkle way up high, and I shine in the dark sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very far away.
🌃 You see me at night.
🌠 I can be part of a constellation.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball, and you live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have trees and grass.
💧 I have lots of water!
🏡 People build houses on me.

cosmos.question: I am red, and I am a planet! What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 Like the colour of some tasty chocolate!
🚀 People send rovers to explore me.
🔥 Named after a Roman god of war

cosmos.question: I am big and have rings around me! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock!
🪐 I am a giant planet.
🧊 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am the hottest planet! What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I am closer to the Sun than Earth
🔥 Very hot!
❤️ Named after a goddess of love

cosmos.question: I am very big and have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My red spot is a storm.
💨 I am a gas giant!
💫 I am the biggest planet in our Solar System.

cosmos.question: I am blue and far away! What planet am I?

hints.text: 🟦 I'm far, far away from the Sun!
🌬️ I am a very cold planet.
🌊 Named after the Roman god of the sea.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some are named after animals!
🌃 You can find me in the night sky.
✨ Many ancient myths are based on me.
